dcterms:description: A large-scale dataset consisting of real anonymous questions from the Bing search engine and 8.8 million candidate passages for passage reranking task. The training set contains about 500 thousand positive query-passage pairs and each query has one relevant passage on average.
dcterms:title: MS MARCO Passage Ranking

dcterms:creator: Ellen M. Voorhees
dcterms:description: A newswire collection used by TREC 2004 Robust track, which comprises 250 queries and 0.5 million documents.
dcterms:title: TREC Robust 2004
